about_the_game:
Nameless Bastard is a rogue-lite dungeon crawler. Fast-paced combat, beautiful stylized retro-inspired graphics, rinse-and-repeat progression cycle; we've got it all.

MAKE A NAME FOR YOURSELF

As an adventurer eager to make a name for yourself, you are tasked by the village elder to clear the evil spreading from a nearby dungeon. Fight through the forest and multiple levels of the dungeon to clear the ever-present threat.

UPGRADE IT ALL

Upgrade and enhance various aspects of weapons, spells, character stats, and even the village itself to match your own play style, as you progress through each run, and the game as a whole.

TALES OF THE FORGOTTEN

Adventuring is perilous and many adventurers don't make it. Take a break at the village and listen to larger-than-life songs and tales describing your efforts.

LOOK AT ALL THE PRETTY COLORS

Top it all off with a colorful visual aesthetic, inspired by the games of yore, as well as modern classics.

name: Nameless Bastard
short_description: In this hyper-stylized isometric fantasy rogue-lite, embark on a generations-long journey to defeat the corruption spreading from a nearby dungeon. Fight, die, upgrade, repeat, as you descend into the depths of the dungeon in order to make a name for yourself.
